channel.title: Cs Education on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Cs Education on C'est la Z

item.title: The Hunter Daedalus Fall 2019 recruiting class
item.description: Now that high school seniors have all committed to their respective colleges I though I'd share some information on Hunter's incoming Daedalus (honors CS) cohort. I joke about the first cohort saying that nobody applied to the program. That's kind of true. I jointed Hunter a little over three years ago in late January. That was after high school seniors had already applied to college and at that time the program didn't exist.
